meanings.definition: A type of aquatic invertebrate characterized by a porous body structure.
meanings.sent1: The poriferan in the ocean has many tiny holes in its body.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the poriferan to learn more about its unique body structure.
meanings.sent3: The curious poriferan decided to throw a party and invited all its sponge friends.
meanings.sent4: The poriferan's body is like a sponge, absorbing knowledge from its surroundings.
meanings.sent5: Children love to learn about the poriferan because of its interesting porous body.

meanings.definition: An organism belonging to the phylum Porifera, which includes sponges.
meanings.sent1: The marine biologist observed a poriferan while diving in the reef.
meanings.sent2: A poriferan is a fascinating creature found in various ocean habitats.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous poriferan traveled with a group of playful sponges.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean, the poriferan stands out like a sponge in a sea of fish.
meanings.sent5: The colorful poriferan captured the attention of the young marine enthusiasts.
